title: Madeleine's Drug
description: In Great Brighton, work is a joy doled out by a benevolent administration. You take what you can of it, and outside of work, you take what you like. Madeleine takes Oratory. The only threat to her near-perfect existence is the upcoming Mating. Can she escape it? Will her life ever be so sweet afterwards? Dark future, good reading.
author: Bryan  Murphy
